opening.message: 👋 Hey you! Cute profile 😉 Sooo... what brings you here tonight?

options.text: Just browsing, seeing what’s out there. You?
Looking for a fun time... maybe with you 😏
Honestly? Kinda bored. But you seem cool!
Just downloaded this, no idea what I’m doing lol

browsing_response.message: Haha same! Sometimes it's just nice to chat with someone cute 💬 Sooo... what kinda chats you into?

options.text: Something playful but respectful. I'm not in a rush.
I like a bit of naughty banter if you’re up for it 😉
Honestly, I’m more about real convos than just flirting.
Anything really. Wanna swap pics?

flirty_response.message: Ooh straight to the point huh? 😏 I like a man who knows what he wants. But hey, gotta ask—what does fun mean to you?

options.text: A cheeky convo to start... then see where it goes?
I mean... some steamy pics wouldn’t hurt 😜
Honestly? A cuddle and some solid chats lol
Let’s just meet up and skip the talking 😏

bored_response.message: Well lucky for you, I’m a professional boredom buster 😎 You into deep convos, dirty jokes, or random memes?

options.text: I’m all about the deep convos tbh.
Dirty jokes all day 😏
Memes are my love language 😂
Depends—what’s in it for me? 😉

newbie_response.message: Aww welcome to the jungle 🌴 You’ll fit in just fine. Wanna take it slow or dive into the deep end?

options.text: Let’s take it slow. Get to know each other first?
Deep end baby. Hit me with your best line 😏
Slow is fine… but maybe some cute selfies? 😇
Honestly just looking for a hookup tbh.

respectful_chat.message: That’s honestly refreshing. So let’s talk boundaries... what’s something that’s a definite no for you?

options.text: Unsolicited pics. I like being asked first.
Being rushed into meeting. Let’s vibe first.
People who ghost. Just be real with me.
Honestly not into anything super serious rn.

naughty_banter.message: You cheeky thing 😈 But real talk—are you cool with chatting about boundaries before we get spicy?

options.text: Absolutely! Respect is hot 🔥
I guess... but only if we *have* to 😬
Hmm... I usually just go with the flow.
That sounds like a mood killer tbh 😅

real_convo.message: Love that. Can I ask—how do you feel about consent stuff online? Is it something you usually talk about?

options.text: Definitely. Clear consent is a must.
If it feels right, I go for it… but I try to read the room.
Not usually, I just wait for a ‘yes’ or ‘no’.
I don’t really think about it much, tbh.

swap_pics.message: Woah there 😅 Can I ask first? I like when things feel mutual.

options.text: Of course! You into asking for consent too?
Sure, just figured you’d be cool with it!
Pics are kinda standard here though?
Ugh, never mind then 🙄

talk_consent.message: Love that you’re into talking about it. Consent is sexy, tbh. I like when things are clear, mutual, and ongoing 🔄

options.text: Same here. Enthusiastic and clear always 💯
Yeah, no grey areas. I always check in.
Cool cool. So, we meeting up or? 😏
You’re making it sound like a job interview lol

meet_up.message: You’re giving respectful, hot, and thoughtful vibes 😍 Wanna grab a drink and see where the night takes us?

ends_online.message: Let’s keep chatting for now. You’re fun, and I’m vibing, but let’s not rush it 💬✨

ghosted.message: *You’ve been unmatched.* ❌ Maybe next time bring a bit more respect to the convo.

skip_talking.message: Hmm... I’m more into guys who take their time and check in. Take care ✌️

pics_consent.message: I don’t mind sharing pics, but I always ask first. You cool with that?

options.text: Totally! Asking is sexy 😏
Yeah yeah, just send already 😅
Okay, ask me something then 😇
This is too much effort 😑

see_where_it_goes.message: Best way to be 🧡 You okay with checking in before things get spicy?

options.text: Always! Consent is 🔑
Sure, if it makes you feel better 😏
I guess… but sometimes it kills the mood.
I don’t do check-ins. We’re adults.

cuddle_chats.message: A soft king 😌 That’s kinda hot ngl. Wanna talk more about what you like and don’t like?

options.text: Yes please. Communication is 🔥
Sure, but only if it gets us cuddling faster 😁
I just go with whatever happens tbh.
Bit much for cuddles, don’t you think?

memes_path.message: Memes > Men 😂 But you might be the exception. Let’s talk consent memes: Green flag or cringe?

options.text: Green flag all day 🙌
Depends. Some are funny, some are preachy.
Cringe tbh. Can we just flirt instead?
Memes about consent? That’s a thing?
